feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain changing to freezing rain or rain this evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
